# Automatically generated by Updater v1.0
# @author Daniel J. Finnegan

add_library (
	QRTrackerLib
	SHARED
		"qrtracker.cpp"
)

target_include_directories (
	QRTrackerLib
	PUBLIC
		"include"
)

# Install the dll file into the exe directory in the project root directory
install (
	TARGETS
		QRTrackerLib
	RUNTIME
	DESTINATION
		${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/exe
)
